body.name: Dead Canyon (David Wolf Mystery Thriller Series Book 16)
body.description: Discovering a severed foot sets Detective David Wolf on a deadly collision course.When a drug runner on pre-trial release disappears before his court date, nobody in the Sluice-Byron County Sheriff's Department is surprised. What is shocking, though, is Detective David Wolf finding the mule’s foot, tracking ankle bracelet still attached. It looks like somebody has come to retrieve their man, and to make a statement in the process.Why the bloody theatrics? Wolf wonders, realizing he may never know. Answers involving men like these are often hard to come by. But he soon realizes a psychologist in town, a friend he’s grown close with over the years, has also gone missing, and the two disappearances are linked. And with the news, the doctor's family is now desperate, and Wolf will need to find those answers fast. With the aid of his FBI friend Special Agent Kristen Luke, Wolf embarks on his frantic search, and soon finds that in order to rescue his friend he’ll have to deal with a dangerous, deadly foe. One that has nothing left to lose, and no regard for the lives he takes. In the brand new, action and suspense-filled 16th installment of the International Bestselling David Wolf Series, can Wolf and Luke traverse the depths of evil and come out unscathed this time? Or will death finally catch up to them?

productInformation.value: #6,076 in Kindle Store (See Top 100 in Kindle Store) #19 in Crime Action & Adventure #65 in Action Thriller Fiction #118 in Mystery Action & Adventure

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Another well put together book that was/is a great read. Thank you for keeping the story together and a perfect ending. Looking forward to the next story and hopefully it will be another great book.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's looking good for Favif Wolf's love life! Poor guys such tragedy in this series. Hopefully it all works out in the end. He deserves it..This was an exciting story with a scary bad guy and some good action. Enjoyed the read.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Twisting the night away
reviews.reviewText: A lot of twist and turns in this story. For once David wasn't hanging off a cliff or being beaten. It was just a fast moving mystery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Exciting, engaging. The characters are believable and likable. The book held my attention from the beginning to the end. Can’t wait to read more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Read for David Wolf fans
reviews.reviewText: If you like Joe Pickett, Jack Reacher books, you'll love David Wolf stories.Jeff Carson has a way of relating to the character. I've read all the David Wolf books and have just ordered the next in line, Echoes Fade, can't wait

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A great read
reviews.reviewText: I like the books with David Wolf and I want to read everyone of them! I find all of these books have wonderful Plots that keep you curious about the outcome of the end of the read. I find it fascinating and captivatingto continuously read about the same people and what is happening in their lives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent! Very good book and amazing series. I can not get enough of David Wolf. This book has excitement, and will keep you on the edge of your seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars what great suspense….kept me up again
reviews.reviewText: Start at the beginning so you can get to know this guy. What a dreamboat…..can’t get enough of his life!

reviews.reviewTitle: OK...I admit it .... I'm hooked and SO disappointed I won't be seeing David Wolfe more
reviews.reviewText: I have read each book anticipating that there is more. LOVED the characters, context & series. Thanks Jeff for so many hours of entertainment! Onto the falco series!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Another great David Wolf story. The audible versions are great as well, with good narration. I love the way the guy stays in character and the descriptions of the area. Visited there from the U.K. a while back so particularly special for me.
Enjoyable story not a lot of intrigue but a good read, worth reading and looking forward to another David Wolf story.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: That the book is going to keep you on the edge of your seat
reviews.reviewText: Brilliant David Wolfe book. I have followed these stories from when they 1st one was published.These are some of the best books I have read.Jeff Carson excellent writer
Another excellent mystery, I only wish my authors could write as fast as I read. I love this series and will be waiting impatiently for the next one.
